title: The Giro d’Italia Queen Stage: Will the Mortirolo Crack Pogačar, or Will Pogačar Crush the GC?
content:
'You never know what happens in the mountains': Pogačar holds biggest advantage at this point of the Giro since 1990, but final week will decide everything.

Read the full article at The Giro d’Italia Queen Stage: Will the Mortirolo Crack Pogačar, or Will Pogačar Crush the GC? on Velo.
author: sstokes
